content: {"Name": "Legal Aid Society of Northeastern New York", "Entity_Id": 2302, "Category": "WIC /SNAP Assistance", "Subcategory": "SNAP (Food Stamps) Registration Assistance", "Organization": "Legal Aid Society ", "More_Information": "Call to verify hours of operation and to see if an appointment is necessary.\r\nCherise Bollers is current NOEP coordinator\r\nAlbany County NOEP Coordinator to assist clients and handling cases for SNAP benefit applications.", "Counties": ["Albany"], "Location": "Legal Aid Society of Northeastern New York", "Address": "95 Central Avenue", "City": "Albany", "State": "NY", "Zip": "12206", "Phone": "518-462-6765", "Hours_of_Operation": "Monday - Friday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM", "Cost": "", "Accepts": "", "Website": "https://www.lasnny.org/SNAP/", "Coalition": 0, "CFAN": 0, "Latitude": "42.659810", "Longitude": "-73.766187", "Last_Updated": "08-23-2024", "icon": "star-A12AFF", "collection_name": "Food Pantries within the Capital District", "collection_category": "Food Pantry"}
